info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 6 at 9:26PM EDT until April 7 at 7:00AM EDT by NWS Indianapolis IN
info.description:
...Forecast flooding changed to Minor severity and increased in duration for the following rivers in Indiana...
Big Blue River at Carthage.
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana...
Youngs Creek at Amity.
Fall Creek at Millersville.
Mississinewa River near Ridgeville.
Flatrock River at Saint Paul.
Big Walnut Creek near Reelsville.
Mill Creek near Cataract.
Sugar Creek near Edinburgh.
Fall Creek near Fortville.
...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana...
Sugar Creek at New Palestine.
...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Indiana...
Buck Creek at Acton.
.Heavy rainfall across central Indiana from several events over the past week has brought minor to significant flooding to several rivers, creeks and streams in central Indiana.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Big Walnut Creek near Reelsville.
* WHEN...Until tomorrow morning.
* IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, Flooding begins along portions of Big Walnut Creek.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 PM EDT Sunday the stage was 11.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise. It will then fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight to 12.5 feet late this evening. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks.
Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas.
Flooding is occurring or is imminent. Most flood related deaths occur in automobiles. Do not attempt to cross water covered bridges, dips, or low water crossings. Never try to cross a flowing stream, even a small one, on foot. To escape rising water find another route over higher ground.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind.
The next statement should be issued this evening by around 1030 PM EDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW MORNING
